# Chat Reminder [(by NotZelda)](https://www.twitch.tv/notzelda)

## Description
This allows you to set up an audio reminder (or anything) on the next chat message, when nothing has been said in chat in a specified amount of time. Even the best of us has dead period in chat, and you don't want to miss a message when one does come in. Get reminded to look at chat after an amount of time!

## Installation
Copy the follwing import code and pate into the `Import Pane`:
```text

```
![chat-reminder-import.png](/extensions/chat-reminder/images/chat-reminder-import.png)

## Configuration
Tie the `Action` `Chat Reminder` to the `Event` `Chat Message`. ![chat-reminder-event.png](/extensions/chat-reminder/images/chat-reminder-event.png)

Change the `Sound File` in the `Action` `ChatWakeUp` to any sound file you want to use. ![chat-reminder-sound.png](/extensions/chat-reminder/images/chat-reminder-sound.png)
> This will now play a sound after so much time has passed with nothing being said in chat. 
> 
> {.is-info}
